title.en: A Prayer to Orgyen Jigme Chökyi Wangpo

text.en: Oṃ svasti.
text.en-trans: om swasti

text.en: Reddish yellow, the spray of your hand adorned with a sword,
text.en-trans: marser raldri chak gi chuktren gyen

text.en: Perfectly handsome amidst a web of wisdom light rays,
text.en-trans: khyenpé özer drawé künné dzé

text.en: Ablaze and golden with the radiance of a pristine dawn,
text.en-trans: tüntsam sarwé dangden ser sek zhin

text.en: Your wisdom kāya fills the whole of space in every direction.
text.en-trans: chok chü khaying khyabpé yeshe ku

text.en: You are without equal in displaying all at once
text.en-trans: jesu chakpé roltsé bumtrak gya

text.en: Manifestations of love by their hundreds of thousands,
text.en-trans: chik char tön la tsungpa mepa dang

text.en: And in opening doors to samādhi by the score.
text.en-trans: tingdzin gomo gyatrak mangpo jé

text.en: Thus, the victorious ones and their heirs extol you
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé dang chepé rab ngak shing

text.en: And pin flowers of praise to the five families at your crown.
text.en-trans: töpé metok rik nga u la ching

text.en: Light from the jewel of your topknot illuminates all realms.
text.en-trans: tortsuk norbü ö kyi zhing kün sal

text.en: One and only father of the conquerors, Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: gyalwé yab chik jampal zhönnu ni

text.en: You enter the finest particles and pervade existence and peace.
text.en-trans: tra rab dul la juk ching sizhir khyab

text.en: As the fruit of aspirations, you manifest according to wishes,
text.en-trans: döpé drebu yizhin tön dzé ching

text.en: And appear as a spiritual teacher of supreme intellect,
text.en-trans: lo chok geweshé kyi zuk su tön

text.en: A peerless guide for this decadent age.
text.en-trans: nyikmé drenpa damé nangwar gyur

text.en: You touched the lotus feet of Mañjughoṣa
text.en-trans: jamyang zhab kyi pemo la rek ching

text.en: And thesitarof your wondrous life of liberation played.
text.en-trans: ngotsar namtar tam gyi gyümang trol

text.en: Your texts on awakening activity, the sūtras and so on
text.en-trans: changchub chöpé zhung do lasokpa

text.en: Became a sacred support for teachings and beings, an ornament for all the world.
text.en-trans: ten drö chö dong dzamling kün gyi gyen

text.en: Yeshe Jungne1intentionally reincarnated,
text.en-trans: yeshe jungné samzhin jönpé ku

text.en: Inseparable from the sublime and exalted Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: pakchok jampal yang dang yer miché

text.en: You taught, practised and imparted direct instructions
text.en-trans: dzamling khepé tenchö nam kyi zhung

text.en: On the major treatises of the learned ones of Jambudvīpa—
text.en-trans: ché ching nyamlen martri dompar dzé

text.en: Compassionate guru, I call you to mind again and again.
text.en-trans: lama tukjé chen khyö yangyang dren

text.en: With skill and ingenuity, you tamed unruly beings,
text.en-trans: dul ké semchen tabkhé trul gyi dul

text.en: Stemming the tide of their misdeeds and setting them on the path of virtue,
text.en-trans: dik gyün chö ching gewé lam la kö

text.en: And planted the seed of liberation in all with a connection—
text.en-trans: dreltsé tarpé sabön debpar dzé

text.en: Orgyen Jigme Chökyi Wangpo, to you I bow down.
text.en-trans: orgyen jikme chö kyi wangpor dü

text.en: In the dharma space of fourfold liberation and the six syllables,
text.en-trans: drolwa zhiden yik druk chö kyi khar

text.en: You planted the tethering stake of benefit for all you encountered,
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden sa yi ten pur trün

text.en: And drew in learned, accomplished students through your enlightened acts of speech—
text.en-trans: sung gi trinlé khedrub lob tsokdu

text.en: Heir to the victors, most magnificent of teachers, to you I offer praise.
text.en-trans: gyalsé mawé khyuchok chenpor tö

text.en: When your life was complete, in limitless emanations
text.en-trans: kutsé tarchin dewachen zhing dang

text.en: You continued to teach the Dharma of the Great Vehicle
text.en-trans: ngönpar gawa sok su tekchen gyi

text.en: In the realms of Sukhāvatī, Abhirati and elsewhere—
text.en-trans: chö kyi droleng trulpa pakmé kyi

text.en: Dharma lord, who caused the teachings and beings to prosper,
text.en-trans: ten dror pendé pelwé chö kyi jé

text.en: As a result of my repeated prayers to you,
text.en-trans: khyö la yangyang solwa tabpa yi

text.en: Dispel all obstacles to the practice of sacred Dharma into basic space.
text.en-trans: damchö drubpé barché ying su sol

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings so that I may master sublime bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: changchub sem chok jongpar jingyi lob

text.en: And grant your blessings so that twofold benefit may arise spontaneously.
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhündrub jungwar jingyi lob
